text: Hana's friend
Motion
... I'm reaaalllly sorry!
"Nah, don't worry about it～!"

"I was hoping you'd be able to attend the reunion but
I'm also happy that you're succeeding as an idol!"

"Speaking of which, does this mean you're going 
to appear on TV by yourself, Hana? Isn't that amazing!?

Yeah...
But I'll just be one of several guests is all.
I'm not even sure if I'll even be in picture very much you know.

"Nah, it's already plenty amazing! And it's being broadcast 
nation-wide, so we can even watch it here～...!"

"We'll definitely all watch it together!
And we'll record it!!"

Ahah,
Thanks.
"Ah, hey hey"

"I was just remembering, you know the president from our 3rd year?
They started living together with someone～! Did you know?
Motion

Eh, really?
How mature!
"Ahaha, you're really saying that, Hana?"

"Leaving your hometown, working by yourself, 
and as an idol no less! I think you're the most mature of everyone."

You think so?
I've nevery really felt ──
Motion
"Hana"

Ahah, it's nothing.
Be sure to ask all about the president at the reunion, okay?

"Of course! I'll get all of the details.
I'll give you another call sometime soon, okay!"

──Fufu, thanks.
I'll be looking forward to it.
